title: Panel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk and velvet on canvas
Technique: embroidery using Florentine stitch, cross stitch and petit-point; appliqué
description: Panel of buckram with ground worked solidly in ivory silk. Design of a horn of plenty, great swinging branches and flowers worked in multicolored thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 17th century.Medium: silk and velvet on canvas
Technique: embroidery using Florentine stitch, cross stitch and petit-point; appliqué. 1932-12-6.
